history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00312
FULL TITLE : AN ACT PROVIDING FOR THE HOLDING OF A CONSTITUTIONAL CONVENTION AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS FOR THE ELECTION OF ITS DELEGATES AND FOR THE BUDGET OF ITS OPERATION
SHORT TITLE : The Constitutional Convention Act Of 2016
ABSTRACT : Directs that a Constitutional Convention be held after electing one hundred five (105) delegates elected by qualified voters of the country.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : GARCIA, GWENDOLYN F.
DATE FILED : 2016-06-30
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Reform
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Villar (007 2016-08-08)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
MOTHER BILL: HCR0009
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON CONSTITUTIONAL AMENDMENTS ON 2016-07-26
